Services.name: CAREER COUNSELING
Services.text: Charting out the career path is a key step in planning for the Higher Education. At MYUNIBRIDGE, we put great emphasis on finding the right career path before we begin to plan for your overseas education. Our experienced counselors provide professional counseling services to help students define their career goals and the education relevant to achieving them. This helps students make an informed decision about their higher education.

Services.name: COUNTRY SELECTION
Services.text: Selecting the right education destination can be a daunting task. It may be difficult to choose from a vast array of international universities offering courses in your field of study. At MYUNIBRIDGE we take all factors such as academic needs, budget, and student preferences into consideration when we help them select the right destination for overseas education.

Services.name: COURSE SELECTION
Services.text: To select the course best suited to your aptitude and interests, it is important to have the right information. MYUNIBRIDGE has a wide network of education experts around the world and we keep our databases updated with the latest information on all available courses. Our counsellors analyze all the relevant information including your preference, academic background, and career goals, before recommending a course to a student.

Services.name: LANGUAGE TRAINING
Services.text: We have specialized foreign language training platform namely FLUENZY the language school where we train students for International Language Tests like IELTS, TESOL, BEC (English), A1-B2 ( German ,French & Spanish) . Our Language trainers are global qualified ,well experienced and dedicated coaches who can truly mentor and guide children in Listening, Speaking ,Reading and Writing skills in the respective languages

Services.name: SCHOLRASHIP APPLICATION
Services.text: One of the major features that makes UNIBRIDGE unique from its counterparts is the professional understanding and assistance of the team with Scholarship Awarding programs  like ERASMUS MUNDUS, TEMPUS etc..

Services.name: TRAVEL ASSISTANCE
Services.text: We understand how important it is to be well-prepared when you are travelling abroad. This is why MYUNIBRIDGE offers end-to-end travel assistance and support to all students. We help you to make all your bookings on time and find the most economic air tickets, hotel accommodations, and local travel assistance. Our counselors provide useful information regarding special student discounts and schemes offered by airlines.

Services.name: VISA GUIDANCE
Services.text: Applying for a visa to a foreign country involves several formalities and elaborate paperwork. All the information about the latest visa regulations and required documentation is available with MYUNIBRIDGE counsellors. We help students get their visa formalities completed with ease, by providing the right information and helping to compile all the requisite documents on time.

Services.name: VISA INTERVIEW TRAINING
Services.text: At MYUNIBRIDGE we offer extensive preparation for visa interviews for all education destinations. After all the paperwork is completed and submitted, students are given mock interviews and customized preparation for visa interviews. We provide information about the most common interview questions and situations that students encounter during a visa interview. We also guide you for better self-confidence, preparation, and presentation to help you succeed in the visa interview

Services.name: PRE DEPARTUTRE ASSISTANCE
Services.text: MYUNIBRIDGE organizes pre-departure orientation sessions for our students. These sessions offer an opportunity to meet other students who are also travelling abroad for studies. Interaction with other students going to the same country can help you sort out various aspects of moving abroad such as accommodation arrangement, local transportation, purchasing household items, getting a part-time job, etc. Our pre-departure guidance also includes assistance for Forex, debit cards, and connecting our students with current students at the university you are going to study at.
